name: Grameenphone IT
description: Grameenphone IT is a leading IT company in Bangladesh, specializing in software development, enterprise solutions, and digital transformation services. It is a subsidiary of Grameenphone, the largest telecommunications company in Bangladesh.

name: Robi Axiata Limited
description: Robi Axiata Limited is a leading telecommunications company in Bangladesh that also offers a range of IT services. It is a subsidiary of Axiata Group, one of the largest telecommunications companies in Asia.

name: eGeneration Ltd.
description: eGeneration Ltd. is a top IT company in Bangladesh, providing software development, mobile application development, and digital marketing services. It has won several awards for its innovative solutions and high-quality services.
